summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LifeLink organ donation platform MVP. All core features including user registration, authentication, profile management, blood type compatibility matching, and hospital coordination are working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Minor 404 console errors for static resources (favicon, etc.)

passed_tests: Backend API - All 23 endpoints (100% success rate)
User registration for all three roles (donor, recipient, hospital)
Login functionality with proper error handling
Hospital profile creation and dashboard navigation
Potential matches display for donors and recipients
Landing page navigation and user type selection
Authentication flow and JWT token handling
Real-time UI updates after profile changes
